examples.title: Perfect Present – Segment A
examples.text: There's times when I think I have it in me to get past a moment or a space. The reality is that I struggle...

examples.title: Perfect Present – Segment B
examples.text: Like everyone else, you left. Leaving behind a trail of memories, of things that we never got to say to each other.

examples.title: Perfect Present – Segment C
examples.text: In between the lines of what was, I become. In the noise of life, I survive. In the time that it took for you to figure out who I was, I already knew!
